page.title: 03SURVEY - NORRISTHORPE PEOPLE
page.content: As a group of pupils from Norristhorpe Primary School we decided to interview a number of people in the area in order to find out something about their{life-style}and their ideas for improving{amenities}in the area. These were our findings:- {People interviewed:}- 18. {Married:}- 13 (All with children). {Employed:}- 9 (Working a 5 day week at an average of 9\ hours a day). {Housing:}Detached - 5; Semi - 6; Terraced - 3; Flat - 2; Pub.House - 2 With Garage - 11; Double Glazing - 8; Central Heating - 9. {Cars:}With 1 car - 9; with 2 cars - 4; with company car - 2. {Holidays:}In Britain - 12; Abroad - 4. {Suggestions for more Amenities:}Youth Centre; Adventure Playground; Clubs with entertainment; more shops (most people shop in Heckmondwike).
